@mdavidallen not necessarily, in SVG coordinate system rects are placed by their bottom left corner (ugly) and require 4 params to display (x,y,width,height) but circles are placed at the center (beautiful) and require 3 (cx,cy,radius) - small change that makes prototyping a lot better imo
circles are so much better than rects in svg, all my prototyping is with circles, they have a cx, a cy, and an r - this is my dirty secret (make everything a circle)

commits.message: fix: apply hardcoded colors to NYC Mayor map as General Election
CRITICAL: Remove 5 second startup delay for migration
fix: force hardcoded colors for General Election races (override API colors)
Add MigrationModal for frontend JSON→Metro conversion UI
fix: hardcode party colors for General Election races (Democratic #0256EC, Republican #E12222)
Merge pull request #662 from decisiondeskhq/october-29-hotfixes
fix: merge conflict
Merge branch 'staging' into october-29-hotfixes
CRITICAL FIX: Convert sync I/O operations to async (no more UI freezes)
Merge staging into october-29-hotfixes - resolve conflicts by keeping october-29-hotfixes versions
Revert: Don't read JSON files during listing - honor .metro format
optimize: skip historical data fetch for Governor races
fix: Display state synchronization with Controller navigation
Add cityCode display to save list for JSON files
fix: add HTTP status check to fetchNationalData
fix: correct Display socket logging variable reference
fix: gracefully handle missing historical data for Governor races
Switch from streaming to paginated save loading (efficient memory use)
feat: comprehensive debug logging for manual refresh flow
fix: add cache control to race data fetches for manual refresh
debug: add logging to manual refresh for debugging race call timing issues
Implement progressive save listing - renders as they load
fix: remove race condition in manual refresh button
fix: Governor race schema validation and NYC Mayor map styling
Revert: Stop reading full JSON files during save listing (CRITICAL PERF FIX)
Fix metadata display for JSON saves (extract stats on read)
Add one-time save header upgrade with progress UI
Fix save metadata display (S, R, T stats now showing)
Move pending save storage from IndexedDB to main process IPC
Remove all isElectron() checks from UI - always Electron now
Delete 123 lines of dead browser/IndexedDB code - Electron-only now
Fix code smells: proper Electron detection + fs optimization
Remove unnecessary sorting operations - 4 separate optimizations
Optimize startup with O(n) max-finding for single save lookup
Remove emoji spam and performance-killing logs from autosave
Delete getSavedGames() function - was loading 625MB-1.25GB into memory
Delete EmergencyFix and use proper UniversalSaveManager - FIXES LAG!
refactor: move disableLogin to environment variable
